org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory

Interface ItemStack

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataHolder, DataSerializable

    public interface ItemStack
extends DataHolder, DataSerializable
    Represents a stack of a specific ItemType. Supports serialization and can be compared using the comparators listed in ItemStackComparators.

    ItemStacks have varying properties and data, it is adviseable to use DataHolder.getData(Class) to retrieve different information regarding this item stack.

      Gets the ItemType of this ItemStack.

    • Method Detail

      • getItem

        ItemType getItem()
        Gets the ItemType of this ItemStack.
        Returns:
        The item type

      • getQuantity

        int getQuantity()
        Gets the quantity of items in this stack. This may exceed the max stack size of the item, and if added to an inventory will then be divided by the max stack.
        Returns:
        Quantity of items

      • setQuantity

        void setQuantity(int quantity)
          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the quantity in this stack.
        Parameters:
        quantity - Quantity
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If quantity set exceeds the getMaxStackQuantity()

      • getMaxStackQuantity

        int getMaxStackQuantity()
        Get the maximum quantity per stack. By default, returns ItemType.getMaxStackQuantity(), unless a different value has been set for this specific stack.
        Returns:
        Max stack quantity
